duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategically drive alignment between business unit objectives and enterprise security strategy, ensuring adherence to corporate security policies.
Initiate and foster partnerships with stakeholders, promoting trust and increasing efficiency of program implementation.
Influence and cascade a strategic cyber risk management vision, ensuring secure business operations without slowing innovation.
Develop and maintain a network of industry contacts, performing research on industry trends and making strategic recommendations.
Stay current with the external threat environment and advise relevant stakeholders on the appropriate course of action.
Support the development of risk remediation action plans, ensuring the priority of security work and management of security incidents.
Advocate security recommendations for third party risk management and expand the depth of security across application development teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in technical or business discipline, or related experience; Master's Degree preferred.
